item.title: If you're having trouble programming data file imports, try RStudio's code preview
item.description: When it comes to importing flat data files stored locally on your computer, such as csv’s or xls’s, you might be uncertain which method to use. It can also be hard to remember how to do it or the options that are available for various file types…

item.title: Note to Self
item.description: This is the first post in a series where I write to myself regarding the various data science spells I’m learning. Today’s spell: dplyr’s filter function…

item.title: Plotting multiple lines on the y axis of a ggplot graph
item.description: I wanted to plot the yearly sales of three different types of hybrid and electric vehicles on the same graph. The dataset was originally wide with years as columns and the types of cars as rows…
